<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (O.getHeader().filetype == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/macho/#a4099e754341e36bdbc04624fa2f1e19aa0720b97729bd97889599a4dc76faf0dc">MachO::MH&#95;OBJECT</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumberOfSections =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal">          (Is64Bit ? O.getSegment64LoadCommand(LC).nsects</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal">                   : O.getSegmentLoadCommand(LC).nsects);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal">      P2CurrentAlignment = NumberOfSections ? 2 : P2MinAlignment;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> &lt; NumberOfSections; ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="normal">        P2CurrentAlignment = std::max(P2CurrentAlignment,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="normal">                                      (Is64Bit ? O.getSection64(LC, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>).align</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="normal">                                               : O.getSection(LC, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>).align));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="normal">      P2CurrentAlignment =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57d2f9ee99e9e68cff564d0d579c8163">llvm::countr&#95;zero</a>(Is64Bit ? O.getSegment64LoadCommand(LC).vmaddr</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    : O.getSegmentLoadCommand(LC).vmaddr);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal">    P2MinAlignment = std::min(P2MinAlignment, P2CurrentAlignment);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// return a value &gt;= 4 byte aligned, and less than MachO MaxSectionAlignment</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::max(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uint32&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(2),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::min(P2MinAlignment, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uint32&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/object/machouniversalbinary/#ad0ac2adcfd6be41ed526a12ddd2215d2">MachOUniversalBinary::MaxSectionAlignment</a>)));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
